name: amodels-browser-extension
description: aModels Browser Extension - Apple-standard TypeScript implementation

scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/fonts && (cp -a *.html *.css *.js manifest.json dist/ 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -a src/*.html src/*.css dist/ 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -a src/fonts/* dist/fonts/ 2>/dev/null || true)
